node.title: Abomination of Desolation in Antichrist's Day, Part 3
node.description: Pastor Don Mackintosh, Pastor of the Weimar Campus Church, continues his Abomination of Desolation Series with part 3, discussing events that lead to the desolation of the sanctuary by Nebuchadnezzar. He leads us into very interesting similarities of abominations that occurred before the formation of the United States of America and how it will affect us today.
